title: (x) "Starving" popular slab serif - Cholla Slab {Sebastian}
content:
Hello guys, i’ve been trying to figure out what type it is for a couple of hours, and the name of the foundry who made it, but it’s quite difficult to find it. Any saver could help me?

I’ve been told it’s very popular, but i’ve been browsing on a lot of foundries and shops and didn’t find it anywhere.

sorry for the quality of the image, i know it’s quite pixelised, but this is more or less the only example i have.

thank you in advance for your help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [starving.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411125950/http:/typophile.com/files/starving_0.jpg) | 24 KB |

 [‹ (x) Mercedes Benz campaign font - Corporate A {Tiff}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411125950/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12962 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Sans w/ subtle serifs - Clearface Gothic {Brandon Schoe—} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411125950/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36703 "Go to next forum topic")
author: victorm

comments.content:
That should be Cholla Slab by Emigre.  
Link: [http://www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=84](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411125950/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=84)
